summary: This is an internal email chain from July 2, 2020, congratulating a team on the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell that morning. It highlights that the charges were not inevitable but the result of extensive work by the team, and mentions an upcoming press conference.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email chain; she was arrested the morning of July 2, 2020, and is described as 'a woman very worthy of criminal prosecution.'

events.title: Arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested in the morning. The email congratulates the team on this accomplishment.

events.title: Press Conference on Maxwell Case
events.description: A press conference was scheduled for 12:00 on the day of the arrest to discuss the case.

events.title: Team Call Discussing Maxwell Case
events.description: A call was held on Tuesday (June 30, 2020) where the case was discussed, highlighting the team's work.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested on the morning of July 2, 2020.
The charges against Maxwell were described as not inevitable but the result of 'an extraordinary amount of work and perseverance and creativity' by the team.
The conduct forming the basis of the case is noted as being very old, potentially older than the team's paralegals.
A press conference regarding the case was scheduled for 12:00 on July 2, 2020.
